title: National Skill Development Data Standard (NSDDS) - Version 1
description: Common data standard for reporting skill training outcomes across ITIs, PMKVY, and apprenticeship programs in India.

trainee_id.description: Unique identifier for the trainee, as issued by the training provider or a central registry.

training_partner_id.description: Unique identifier of the training partner (ITI, PMKVY center, private partner) as registered with NSDC/MSDE.

course_code.description: Official course code as per the National Skills Qualification Framework (NSQF) or the training partner's own coding scheme.

assessment_score.description: Final assessment score (percentage or grade points) obtained by the trainee.

certification_status.description: Whether the trainee has been certified after assessment.

placement_status.description: Current placement outcome of the trainee after completion of training.

placement_details.description: Additional details about placement, required when placement_status is 'Placed'.

employer_name.description: Name of the employer/organization where the trainee is placed.

ctc.description: Cost to Company (CTC) in Indian Rupees per annum.

date_of_joining.description: Date when the trainee joined the employer (YYYY‑MM‑DD).

training_completion_date.description: Date when the trainee completed the training (YYYY‑MM‑DD).

assessment_date.description: Date when the final assessment was conducted (YYYY‑MM‑DD).
